thread.title: BRIEF-Air Canada Pilots Association Elects New Chair Of Governing Council

title: BRIEF-Air Canada Pilots Association Elects New Chair Of Governing Council

organizations.name: brief-air canada pilots association elects new chair of governing council
brief-air canada pilots association elects new chair of governing council   air canad

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Air Canada Pilots Association:
* AIR CANADA PILOTS ASSOCIATION ELECTS NEW CHAIR OF GOVERNING COUNCIL
* ‍AIR CANADA PILOTS ASSOCIATION - ELECTED MATT HOGAN AS CHAIR AT A SPECIAL MEETING OF ITS MASTER ELECTED COUNCIL​
* ‍AIR CANADA PILOTS ASSOCIATION SAYS MATT HOGAN‘S ONE-YEAR TERM WILL RUN FROM MARCH 1, 2018 UNTIL MARCH 31, 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
